Create matrix of random values drawn from uniform distribution

Source: R/random-matrix.R
runifm.Rd

Create matrix of random values drawn from uniform distribution

runifm(nrow, ncol, min = 0, max = 1)

Arguments

nrow

number of rows
ncol

numer of columns
min

lower limit of the distribution. Must be finite.
max

upper limit of the distribution. Must be finite.

Value

a matrix

Examples

runifm(3, 3)
#>           [,1]      [,2]       [,3]
#> [1,] 0.1746759 0.7793086 0.06521611
#> [2,] 0.5315735 0.2041783 0.35420680
#> [3,] 0.4936370 0.7133973 0.82519942
runifm(4, 5, min = -1, max = 3)
#>            [,1]       [,2]       [,3]       [,4]      [,5]
#> [1,] 0.09527298 -0.2339279  0.1143886  0.8639488 1.2396514
#> [2,] 1.28017980  2.7910558  0.7868099  0.5601255 2.4283343
#> [3,] 0.34287632  1.1699216  0.4860447 -0.9197391 0.5392388
#> [4,] 1.38505116  1.1784136 -0.8877561  0.5078837 1.1116681
